arrowhead.description:
[Principal Edge Attributes]
style of arrowhead at head end

arrowsize.description:
[Principal Edge Attributes]
scaling factor for arrowheads

arrowtail.description:
[Principal Edge Attributes]
style of arrowhead at tail end

colorscheme.description:
[Principal Edge Attributes]
scheme for interpreting color names

constraint.description:
[Principal Edge Attributes]
use edge to affect node ranking

decorate.description:
[Principal Edge Attributes]
if set, draws a line connecting labels with their edges

edgeURL.description:
[Principal Edge Attributes]
URL attached to non-label part of edge

edgetarget.description:
[Principal Edge Attributes]
if URL is set, determines browser window for URL

edgetooltip.description:
[Principal Edge Attributes]
tooltip annotation for non-label part of edge

fontsize.description:
[Principal Edge Attributes]
point size of label

headclip.description:
[Principal Edge Attributes]
if `false`, edge is not clipped to head node boundary

headlabel.description:
[Principal Edge Attributes]
label placed near head of edge

headtarget.description:
[Principal Edge Attributes]
if headURL is set, determines browser window for URL

headtooltip.description:
[Principal Edge Attributes]
tooltip annotation near head of edge

headURL.description:
[Principal Edge Attributes]
URL attached to head label

id.description:
[Principal Edge Attributes]
any string (user-defined output object tags)

labelangle.description:
[Principal Edge Attributes]
angle in degrees which head or tail label is rotated off edge

labeldistance.description:
[Principal Edge Attributes]
scaling factor for distance of head or tail label from node

labelfloat.description:
[Principal Edge Attributes]
lessen constraints on edge label placement

labelfontcolor.description:
[Principal Edge Attributes]
type face color for head and tail labels

labelfontname.description:
[Principal Edge Attributes]
font family for head and tail labels

labelfontsize.description:
[Principal Edge Attributes]
point size for head and tail labels

labelURL.description:
[Principal Edge Attributes]
URL for label, overrides edge URL

labeltarget.description:
[Principal Edge Attributes]
if URL or labelURL is set, determines browser window for URL

labeltooltip.description:
[Principal Edge Attributes]
tooltip annotation near label

layer.description:
[Principal Edge Attributes]
`all`, `id` or `id:id`, or a comma-separated list of the former

lhead.description:
[Principal Edge Attributes]
name of cluster to use as head of edge

ltail.description:
[Principal Edge Attributes]
name of cluster to use as tail of edge

minlen.description:
[Principal Edge Attributes]
minimum rank distance between head and tail

penwidth.description:
[Principal Edge Attributes]
width of pen for drawing edge stroke, in points

samehead.description:
[Principal Edge Attributes]
tag for head node; edge heads with the same tag are merged onto the same port

sametail.description:
[Principal Edge Attributes]
tag for tail node; edge tails with the same tag are merged onto the same port

tailclip.description:
[Principal Edge Attributes]
if `false`, edge is not clipped to tail node boundary

taillabel.description:
[Principal Edge Attributes]
label placed near tail of edgetail

tailtarget.description:
[Principal Edge Attributes]
if tailURL is set, determines browser window for URL

tailtooltip.description:
[Principal Edge Attributes]
tooltip annotation near tail of edge

tailURL.description:
[Principal Edge Attributes]
URL attached to tail label

target.description:
[Principal Edge Attributes]
if URL is set, determines browser window for URL

weight.description:
[Principal Edge Attributes]
integer cost of stretching an edge
